message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value of your business. Based on its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential return on investment for you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this opportunity to fruition.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value of your product, $1,350,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm prepared to offer $1,250,000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering both our needs. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a proposal that could work for both of us. Considering the value of the product and your budget constraints, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $1,300,000 for the product. I believe this price strikes a balance between the value of the product and your financial considerations. I am looking forward to your thoughts on this offer.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,300,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1,275,000, which is a compromise that I believe is fair for both of us. Let's see if we can close the deal at this price.

I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial solution, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to meet you halfway. My final counteroffer is $1,287,500 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while accommodating your budget constraints. I hope this proposal will help us reach an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but unfortunately, I'm still a bit over my budget.  While I value your product and appreciate your flexibility, I'm going to have to decline this offer. I'm willing to make one final counteroffer: $1,250,000. This is truly my limit, but I hope you'll consider it.  Let me know if you're willing to accept this final offer.
